words.source: H3212 yalakh, Qal wayyiqtol 3ms; KJV 'went', ESV 'went', NASB 'went'

H7725 shuv, Qal cohortative 1cs + waw conjunction; KJV 'and return', ESV 'and go back', NASB 'and return'
H413 ʾel, preposition; KJV 'unto', ESV/NASB 'to'

H4714 Mitsrayim, proper noun + preposition be; KJV/ESV/NASB 'in Egypt'
H7200 raʾah, Qal cohortative 1cs + waw conjunction; KJV 'and see', ESV/NASB 'and see'
H5750 ʿod, adverb + article he + 3mp suffix; KJV 'whether they be yet', ESV 'whether they are still', NASB 'whether they are still'

H559 ʾamar, Qal wayyiqtol 3ms; KJV/ESV/NASB 'said'
